mapper.insert: insert into risk_order (risk_no, merchant_order_no, trans_no, merchant_id, merchant_name, trans_amount, product_code, trans_type, create_time, update_time, update_author, order_dealwith, order_status, product_name, quota_id, quota_item,quota_type,rule_detail_id) values (#{riskNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{merchantOrderNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{transNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{merchantCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{merchantName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{transAmount,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{productCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{transType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{updateAuthor,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{orderDealwith,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{orderStatus,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{productName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{quotaId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{quotaItem,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{quotaType,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{ruleDetailId,jdbcType=BIGINT})
